review_text: I love this shovel! 10/10 would recommend.
I fell from this ladder! Don't recommend.
I hit my thumb with this hammer!
I cleaned my sidewalk super easily.
I made the best brownies ever with this mixer!
I couldn't reach what I needed to.
Raked up my leaves perfectly but was useless to get them in a bag.
I finished my woodworking project with this awesome miter saw.
My bread didn't rise but it tasted great.
The leaf blower wasn't strong enough.
It did what I needed but was hard to hold.
It worked perfect and I got my lawn mowed in no time.
It worked okay but didn't vacuum up everything I needed it to.
